part1.title: Front End Engineer
part1.content: I am a front end engineer with almost three months' experience, I started to get into this industrial in 2020. So then we had a course - 'HTML & CSS Web Design' during college which impressed me, that was so cool and so amazing!!! It turned out I was a visual effects lover. So I tried hard to teach myself html and css and catch up with JavaScript. I want to be a UI designer and front end engineer. That`s the motivation that keeps me moving on.

part2.title: My Hobbies
part2.â€˜content: I like to listen to psychedelic rock, and bands like Sunset Rollercoaster, Cigarette After Sex, etc... Editing videos is also one of my hobbies, but lately there has been a lot going on and I haven't had time to edit, so my latest video updates are still stuck in 2018. ğŸ¤£

part3.title: Next Movement
part3.content:
Keep trying and learing new things
Keep challenge my limits and striving for excellence
